name: Sir Abandon
description:
The project of this game was designed in 2017. It is an RPG type game, in 2D retro. You play as a knight (Sir Abandon) who will evolve through many levels.

You will have to farm certain levels several times to increase your experience and gain levels, as well as collect enough gold to improve your equipment.

Without it, it will be difficult for you to move forward. The release of the game is scheduled for 2023. It will be accessible initially on the Steam platform, and depending on its success, on the Nintendo Switch, as well as other platforms.
